page.shortlink: api client api a5 buttonlist updatebutton method

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the button in the button list to update.

argument.name: button
argument.description: An object containing the text, icon(s) and state of the specified button in the button list. See *[link:A5.ButtonList]* for details on the contents of the object.

page.description: Update a button in the button list.
page.example: // assume "colorsBtnList" is an A5.ButtonList colorsBtnList.updateButton('blue',{html: 'Sky BLue'});
